summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1315, for the improvement of Weller Street, in the City of Seattle, from Sixteenth Avenue South to Twenty-first Avenue South, by grading and regrading the same and by constructing wooden curbs, gutters, crosswalks and concrete sidewalks, under Ordinance No. 14961 and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
